parameter.name: country
parameter.label: Country
parameter.description: Country to get prices for. Only DE (Germany) and AT (Austria) are supported.

parameter.name: vatPercent
parameter.label: VAT Percent
parameter.description: Specifies the value added tax percentage

parameter.name: basePrice
parameter.label: Base Price
parameter.description: Specifies the net base price per kWh

parameter.name: timeZone
parameter.label: Time Zone
parameter.description: Time zone to apply to the hour definitions. Default CET aligns to the aWATTar API

parameter.name: rangeStart
parameter.label: Range Start
parameter.description: Earliest possible hour of bestprice period.

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Length
parameter.description: The number of hours the bestprice period should last

parameter.name: consecutive
parameter.label: Consecutive
parameter.description: Do the hours need to be consecutive?
